title: WATCH: Ronaldinho's best goals and skills
description: Following Ronaldinho’s retirement from football, we’ve compiled some of his best goals and skills from the Barcelona and Brazil legend.
content: After a career which included winning the World Cup in 2002, the Champions League in 2006 and the Ballon d'Or in 2005, Ronaldinho has now officially hung up his boots at the age of 37.The maverick Brazilian left a long-lasting legacy and will be remembered as a true great of the modern era.Hit the video to watch some of the best goals and skills from Ronaldinho's glittering career.
dbpedia: After a career which included winning the World Cup in 2002, the Champions League in 2006 and the Ballon d'Or in 2005, Ronaldinho has now officially hung up his boots at the age of 37.The maverick Brazilian left a long-lasting legacy and will be remembered as a true great of the modern era.Hit the video to watch some of the best goals and skills from Ronaldinho's glittering career.
